ChatBot HTML Sample
[ Use Host Features | Use ChatBot | View User Warnings ]

Microsoft Chat Control
Login to chat servers by entering a nickname, and correct room path with the Microsoft Chat Control. Use the host features and ChatBot when you are the host of the room.
Real Name: Room Path:
Nickname: Room Topic:

Host/Admin Functions
Return to Top
The below functions can be controlled if you are a host of a chat room. Kick and/or change user status by selecting a name from the participants list, ban users by first typing in their nickname, unban by selecting their name from the banned list.
Kick Comment:


User Nickname:
 Users Banned:

ChatBot
Return to Top
You must be the host of a room using the Microsoft Chat Control (above) to use ChatBot. If you are not the host of the room, ChatBot will not be able to Kick or Ban chat members. Use the text boxes below to control what the ChatBot says when it warns or kicks, and how often. If nothing is specified, default values will be used. Ban members after kicking them by using the check box, add words permanently by editing this HTML file, or add/remove words temporarily using the buttons.

ChatBot NickName:
ChatBot Warning:


ChatBot Kick Comment:
 Scanned Items:

# of warnings before kicked: (Ban after kick: )

User Warnings
The information below will display chat members' nickname, participant ID and the number of warnings they have while they are in the chat room.
